(zum Beispiel Grundstück, Familienheim,: (e.g. plot of land, homestead, home ownership, building lease)
(zum Beispiel Kapitallebensversicherung,: (e.g.capital-sum life insurance, cash, objects of value, loans, claim of gain balancing)
**In diesen Fällen muss der Antrag binne: In these cases the application must be received by the district court within 4 weeks after the beginning of counselling, otherwise, the application for legal advice aid will be rejected.
**Weitere Kosten** können auch auf Sie z: **Further costs** may arise for you as well if you gain something as a result of the legal advise aid. The counsellor put in a request that the legal advice aid is to be cancelled, and they can demand the fees from you, which you agreed upon earlier with them regarding this matter. However, the counsellor must have **refered** to this possibility in writing before agreeing to represent you.
**Weitergehende Gebühren** können auf Si: **Further fees** can arise for you, if the district court denies your application **after the legal advice aid has taken place**, or the decision to grant legal advice aid is **revoked** at a later date. In these cases, you must pay the costs of legal advice. You can recieve further information about this at the district courts or from counsellors.
**Wichtig: Wenn Sie nicht alle diese Käs: **Important: If you can not cross all these boxes, the legal advice aid will not be granted. In this case, you *don't* need to continue answering the further questions.**
*Diese Felder sind nicht vom Antragstell: *These fields are not to be filled by the applicant*
Antrag auf Bewilligung von Beratungshilf: Application for granting a legal advice aid
Antragsteller (Name, Vorname, ggf. Gebur: Applicant (surname, first name, if changed also name at birth)
Art der Belastung und Begründung dafür:: Type of a charge and its reason:
Auch das **Amtsgericht** gewährt direkt: The **district court** also provides legal advice. It gives immediate information, as far as it relates to your case. The district court also provides information on other possibilities for recieving assistance. It also acceptes your application for legal advice aid or your explanation, and issues, when possible, a Certificate of Eligibility.
Beratungshilfe erhält, wer nach seinen p: You can get the legal advice aid if you **cannot find necessary means** for counselling or representation because of your personal and economic circumstances. As a rule, these are people who recieve constant cost of living benefits according to XII Buch Sozialgesetzbuch („Sozialhilfe“). But the prerequisites may also be met by other persons with a low income. You will recieve further information at the district courts or from counsellors.
Bezeichnung der Bank, Sparkasse/des sons: Description of the bank, savings bank, other financial institution; in case of building society account - payment due date and reference:
Bezeichnung nach Lage, Größe, Nutzungsar: Description of position, size and type of use:
Bitte fügen Sie alle notwendigen Belege: Please enclose copies of all necessary records (especially of your income, your property and financial burdens). You will saving answering a lot of queries, which could delay the process. Answer truthfully and accurately, otherwise the already granted legal advice aid may be revoked and you will have to pay back the costs incurred.
Bitte geben Sie unter „Eigentümer/Inhabe: Fill in by "owner" the following: A = when I am the exclusive owner, B = my spouse/partner is the exclusive owner, C = both to my spouse/partner and I are owners
Bürgerinnen und Bürger mit geringem Eink: Citizens with a low income can recieve legal advice aid to get legal advice, and if necessary, legal representation. The legal advice aid can be given in all fields of law. You will find further details at the court and from the lawyer or counsellor.
Da die Beratungshilfe für die Wahrnehmun: As the legal advice aid is granted to protect the rights during the legal proceedings, there must be **no* pending **legal proceedings** in the same matter. This includes, for example, dispute settlement procedures at a conciliation office, that must first be taken before the court in some federal states (compulsory conciliatory proceedings according to § 15a of the Act concerning the introduction of Code of Civil Procedure (des Gesetzes betreffend die Einführung der Zivilprozessordnung)). The person who wants to be represented at legal proceedings, can get court costs relief or proceedings costs relief.
Da die Mittel für Beratungshilfe von der: As the means for legal advice aid are taken from taxes paid by the general public, the court must examine if you are entiteled to recieve legal advice aid. This form makes this examination easier. Please understand that you must explain your personal and financial situation.
Das Gericht kann Sie auch auffordern, fe: The court can also ask you to provide any missing records and affirm your information in lieu of on oath. If you don't provide the necessary records, it may lead to rejection of your application for lagal advice aid. Besides, providing intentionally wrong and incomplete information can lead to criminal prosecution.
Des Weiteren darf die beabsichtigte Inan: Secondly, the intended claim of legal advice aid should **not** be **wilful**. It is then not wilful if you aren't going to ignore the counselling, and if you could pay the costs yourself.
Die Beratungshilfe gewähren zum einen di: The **counsellors** grant the legal advice (lawyers of the licensed legal assistance chambers, in tax matters - tax consultants and auditors; in retirement matters - pension consultants). Special **legal counselling centers**, which were set up on the basis of an agreement with the County Judicial Administrations, also grant legal advice. They all are obliged to give legal advice, except very certain cases.
Dieses Feld ist nicht vom Antragsteller: This field is not to be filled in by the applicant.
Ehegatte/eingetr. Lebenspartner bzw. Ehe: My spouse/partner has monthly payments of ... EUR
My spouse/partner has monthly payments of ... EUR
Erforderlich ist ein **Antrag**, der mün: It is necessary that the**application** can be made in writing or verbally. Use the attached form to apply in writing. You can apply at the district court or you can make a request directly to the counsellor of your choice from those listed below.
Es darf Ihnen zudem **keine andere Mögli: Moreover, there must be **no other possibility** to get **counselling and/or representation** free of charge in your matter (e.g. as a rule, if you are a member of a trade union, a tenants association or if you have got a legal protection insurance). You must also neither have received free **legal advice aid** in **the same matter**, nor have had it rejected by the court. Whether or not it is the same matter, may have to be reviewed, if necessary, in certain cases.
Fahrzeugart, Marke, Typ, Bau-, Anschaffu: Vehicle type, brand, model, year of manufacture and purchase, mileage:
Familienverhältnis des Angehörigen zu Ih: The relationship of the relative to you (e.g. spouse, child)
Giro-, Sparkonten und andere Bankkonten,: Current account, savings account and other bank accounts, bonds
Haben Sie oder Ihr Ehegatte/eingetragene: Do you or does your spouse/partner have any financial commitments?
Do you or does your spouse/partner pay any other charges?
Hat dieser Angehörige eigene Einnahmen?: Does this relative have their own income?(e.g. schooling allowance, maintenance from another parent)
Hinweisblatt zum Antrag auf Beratungshil: Notes (Hinweisblatt) on the application for legal advice aid
Ich beantrage Beratungshilfe in folgende: I am appyling for legal advice aid in the following matter (shortly describe your case):
Ich habe mich unmittelbar an eine Beratu: I have already referred to one counsellor. The consultation and/or representation took place on ........................ .
Ich habe monatliche Einkünfte in Höhe vo: I have gross monthly income of ...... EUR gross, and a nett income of .... EUR.
Ich versichere, dass meine Angaben volls: I assure that my information is complete and accurate. I have recieved the general information and completion directions for this form.
Ich versichere, dass mir in derselben An: I assure that I have neither recieved legal advice aid in this matter, nor has it been rejected by the court and that this case doesn't or didn't have any legal proceedings.
In der vorliegenden Angelegenheit tritt: I do not have legal insurence that covers the presented case.
In dieser Angelegenheit besteht für mich: As to my knowledge, there is no other possibility to obtain free consultation and legal representation for this case.
In dieser Angelegenheit ist mir bisher B: Untill now, no legal advice aid has been either denied or granted to me in this case.
In dieser Angelegenheit wird oder wurde: No legal proceedings on this matter are/were conducted by me.
Lesen Sie bitte das Antragformular sorgf: Please read through the application form carefully and fill it in conscientiously. You will find the notes on the next page, which should make answering the questions easier. If you have problems filling in the form, the district court or your counsellor will help you.
Liegen die Voraussetzungen für die Gewäh: If the prerequisites for legal advice aid are met, the district court issues you, provided that it is not going to give the counselling itself, a **Certificate of Eligibility for legal advice aid** for a counsellor of your choice. There is a right to appeal against a decision by the district court, which is not limited in time, when your application is rejected. That means that you can give a written explanation to the court of why you don't agree with the decision.
Mein Ehegatte/meine Ehegattin bzw. mein: My spouse/registered partner has net monthly income of ..... EUR.
My flat has an area of ....m2. The total monthly housing costs are ......EUR. I pay ..... EUR.
Mir ist bekannt, dass das Gericht verlan: I am aware, that the court may demand that I make the information provided credible and that it can demand the affirmation in lieu of oath.
Mir ist bekannt, dass unvollständige ode: I am aware that incomplete or wrong information can result in the cancellation of legal advice aid and may lead to criminal prosecution.
Name und Anschrift der Beratungsperson (: Name and address of the counsellor (stamp):
Rückkaufswert oder Verkehrswert in EUR:: cash-in value or market value in EUR:
Sollte der Raum im Antragsformular nicht: If you don't have enough space in the application form, you can write down your information on a separate sheet of paper. Please indicate the enclosed sheet in the corresponding box.
Unterhalt kann in Form von Geldzahlungen: The maintenance may be in the form of money payments but also includes the provision of accommodation, food etc. Please write down the name und surname of these relatives (address, only if it deviates from yours)
Was ist bei der Antragstellung zu beacht: What should I pay attention to when making the application?
Was kostet mich die Beratungshilfe?: How much does the legal advice aid cost for me?
Wenn Sie den Unterhalt ausschließlich du: If you provide the maintenance only in money payments
Wenn Sie laufende Leistungen zum Lebensu: If you are receiving cost of living benefits in accordence with XII Buch Sozialgesetzbuch („Sozialhilfe“) and have enclosed a currently valid confirmation, including the calculation sheet, from the social security office (Sozialamt), you do not have to provide any details in fields C and G, unless the court demands to some extent. If you receive benefits according to II Buch Sozialgesetzbuch („Arbeitslosengeld II“), you must fill in these fields.
Wer erhält Beratungshilfe, was sind die: Who gets the legal advice aid? What are the prerequisites?
Wird die Beratungshilfe nicht bereits du: If the legal advice aid isn't provided by the District court itself, but rather by a counsellor, you must to pay them a fee of 15€. The counsellor may waver this fee. As a rule, the State Treasury bears all remaining costs of legal advice aid.
Wozu Beratungshilfe?: What for is legal advice aid?
Zahlungsverpflichtungen und sonstige bes: Financial commitments and other financial burdens
